title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Annunciation, Study after Innocenza da Imola", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 8 Inocenzo da Imola Bologna. On verso:Lodovico Carracci Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Annunciation: An angel kneels at left pointing at kneeling Virgin at right. Above- God, four angels, and three putti on clouds. Scene set inroom with arched opening to landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Annunciation, Study after Innocenza da Imola", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3488.
